reviewText: I also bought this item after reading the initial review by Andrea R, I was apprehensive about having to put up with subtitles. Instead, I was able to watch the movies in French with no subtitles. What a great value. Just the 2 classics (Le corniaud and La grande vadrouille) usually will cost more than what I paid for,  Everything about this package says quality. Just loved it.

I could not imagine finding this set of movies in an impecable package, French original language, for such a very low price. Thank you, Hungary!
Thank you so much!!!
